definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.chinese: “你要的来了，”他粗声粗气说道。

sentences.english: There was no territorial incursion, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 没有入侵领土，防卫省说道。
“那真是个慈善家，”艾伦猛然说道。

sentences.english: 'Jump up, ' said the man. 'Is that your boy?
sentences.chinese: “上来吧，”车把式说道，“这是你儿子？”

sentences.english: Masa, " he said, having cleared his throat several times."
sentences.chinese: “玛莎，”他清了几个嗓子后说道。

sentences.english: She became so happy and smiled, saying 'I'll take it right now.'
sentences.chinese: 她非常高兴，笑容满面，说道‘我现在就卖。’

sentences.english: “I want that question mark there,” said Staub.
sentences.chinese: “我想这儿要留一个问号，”斯桃波说道。

sentences.english: "This was the blackest cross-roads of my entire life, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “这是我一生中最难决择的时期，”他说道。

sentences.english: "You have to be careful here," he says.
sentences.chinese: “你在这里必须十分小心，”他说道。

sentences.english: They were so sweet. They were bathing us in affection.
sentences.chinese: 他说道，“他们太可爱了，让我们沐浴在热情中。”

sentences.english: "It's not just about the cost, " Metz said.
sentences.chinese: “这不只是花费问题，”麦兹说道。

sentences.english: "It will take time for that risk to be erased from the minds of the Korean public, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “让韩国民众消除恐惧心理是需要时间的”，他说道。

sentences.english: "Oh you naughty Whisker, " said the old lady.
sentences.chinese: “唔，你这个调皮的威斯克呀，”老夫人说道。

sentences.english: “We shall attempt to answer it in this book, ” he wrote.
sentences.chinese: “我们将试图在这本书中回答这个问题”，他说道。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
tone of voice/the way one speaks/manner of expression/tone
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
